author: duncan
msg: Changed bootstrap to use Conor's idea of having a BootBoot that grabs
tools.jar and puts it on the classpath when needed. I did change things
around so that it's now Bootstrap --> Bootstrap2

author: conor
msg: Change behaviour to log a warning rather than throwing an exception. I had
to pass in the project object to get access to logging, unfortunately.

author: conor
msg: Throw a BuildException when an attempt is made to use a property which has
not been set. Any build files which rely on non-set properties being passed

author: bodewig
msg: Make perforce tasks work on Windows 2000 as well.

author: donaldp
msg: Removed *Entry abstraction as it was overkill for Ant atm.
